LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning:
Kesä on alkanut! Talvi on silti tulossa.

Sinun ruokaviljelmäsi eivät kasva talven kylmässä. Varmista, että sinulla on ruokaa varastossa usean kuukauden tarpeiksi kun sinulla on siihen vielä mahdollisuus.

Voit rakentaa pakastehuoneen estääksesi ruuan pilaantumisen.

Yritä lisäksi ostaa, varastaa tai tehdä itse anorakkeja tai jäädyt astueassasi ulos.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenDown: Suhteesi ryhmän {0} kanssa ovat tulehtuneet. He ovat nyt vihamielisiä sinua kohtaan.
LanguageData.RelationsWarmed: Suhteesi ryhmän {0} kanssa ovat lämmenneet. He eivät ole enää vihamielisiä sinua kohtaan.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenCapture: Koska kaappasit henkilön {0}, {1} on nyt vihollisesi.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRain: {0} on mennyt oikosulkuun sateessa ja on sytyttänyt tulipalon.
LanguageData.AreaRevealedWithMechanoids: Uusi alue on paljastunut. Siinä on muinaisia ja vihamielisiä mekanoideja.
LanguageData.RoofCollapsed: Katto on romahtanut koska se oli liian kaukana tukirakenteista.
LanguageData.BirthdayChronological:
Tänään on henkilön {0} syntymäpäivä! Hänen biologinen ikänsä on {3} vuotta.
\Ajanlaskun mukaan {1} täytti juuri {2}.

Huomaa, että ihmiset eivät ikäänny ollessaan salaunessa, ja siksi ajanlaskun mukainen syntymäpäivä on erillinen biologisesta syntymäpäivästä.
LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} tuli sairaaksi ({1}). Varmista että {0} saa kunnollista hoitoa ja viettää mahdollisimman paljon aikaa sängyssä parantuakseen nopeasti.
LanguageData.NewPartDisease: {0} sai {1}-tartunnan. Varmista että {0} saa kunnollista hoitoa ja viettää mahdollisimman paljon aikaa sängyssä parantuakseen nopeasti.
LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: Kun {0} lähestyy muinaista seinää, pahaenteinen tunne valtaa hänet. Hän ei ole varma miksi, mutta hän tuntee että tämä pölyinen rakennelma saattaa sisältää suuren vaaran.
LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {0} on vahingossa laukaissut ansan ja ottanut siitä vahinkoa.
LanguageData.LetterLeadersDeath: Leader {0} of faction {1} has died and been replaced by {2}.
LanguageData.LetterLeaderChanged: {0} is no longer {3} of {1}.\n\nThe new {3} is {2}.
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidEnemy:
There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of {0}.

Keep in mind that even though they are related, they will still attack each other because of their bad factions relations.

These people are:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidFriendly: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of friendly {0}:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsNeutralGroup: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradeShip: The orbital trader is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithSettlement: The settlement is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithOtherCarava: The caravan is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextColonist: [PAWN_nameDef] has a relationship with a colonist. [PAWN_pronoun] is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextPrisoner: [PAWN_nameDef] has a relationship with one of your prisoners. [PAWN_pronoun] is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.LetterAffair: {0}, married to {1}, has begun an affair with {2}.
LanguageData.LetterNewLovers: {0} and {1} have come together and are now lovers.
LanguageData.LetterNoLongerLovers: {0} and {1} are no longer in a relationship.
LanguageData.LetterAcceptedProposal: {1} has accepted {0}'s marriage proposal.\n\nAt some point in the coming days or seasons, they will have their marriage ceremony and invite all the colonists. Consider placing a marriage spot if you want to control where the ceremony occurs.
LanguageData.LetterRejectedProposal: {1} has rejected {0}'s marriage proposal. {0} is going to be unhappy about this.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDied: {0}, bonded to {1}, has died. It will affect {1}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDied: {0} named {1}, bonded to {2}, has died. It will affect {2}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{1}
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} named {1} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{2}
LanguageData.LetterNewParty: {0} is throwing a party! Everyone who goes will gain joy and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
LanguageData.LetterNewlyAddicted: {0} has developed an addiction to {1}.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] now has a need for {1}, visible on [PAWN_possessive] Needs tab. [PAWN_pronoun] will automatically consume the drug to fulfil [PAWN_possessive] need. If [PAWN_pronoun] cannot get any {1}, [PAWN_pronoun] will go into withdrawal.
LanguageData.LetterFormedCaravan: Your caravan has formed and awaits orders on the world map.
LanguageData.LetterAllCaravanColonistsDied: All members of your caravan have died.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredAmbushMap: {0} has arrived at the ambush site.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBase: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBaseBecameHosti: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.\n\nBecause of your hostile approach, {2} is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated: The enemy outpost {0} has been destroyed.\n\nYou have {1} hours to collect items before your colonists reform the caravan.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated_FactionDestroy: This was the last base of {0}, which means the faction does not exist anymore.
LanguageData.LetterPawnsLostDueToMapCountdown: Some of your animals or prisoners were left behind in the wilderness:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.LetterDefeatAllEnemiesQuestCompleted: You have defeated the enemy outpost!\n\nThe payment from {0} has arrived, and faction relations have improved by {1}.
LanguageData.LetterFoundPreciousLump: Your long-range mineral scanner has found a lump of precious resources nearby.\n\nWe don't know who or what - if anything - might be guarding it.
